                 int fromStartIndex,

                 CrypterProvider cp,

                 CopyFilesData cfd)
        copy file, overwrite if not update CopyFilesData.isUpdate()
        Parameters:
        fromPath -
        fromStartIndex - index of the source root path in fromPath
        toRootPath - target root path
        cp - the crypter provider initialized with current secret
        newSecret - the secret to use for encryption
        cfd -
